overview_of_class: This course provides a dynamic introduction to current debates in comparative politics, enabling students to critically analyze various democratic systems and regime.
name: Topics in Political Science
title: DOHA POLI_SCI 242-0-70 Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides a dynamic introduction to current debates in comparative politics, enabling students to critically analyze various democratic systems and regime.

  • Open for cross-registration
